well it's goes back to almost um my

sort of happy kind of story you

they're never written of that way it's

and in my book I try I always refer to

the fact that this is a relationship
that's not it's a Master Slave
relationship a servant Master
relationship but there's a blood
relationship between um these people as
well and invite people to because it

at that time and slave life was um the
slave Society really was so I think the
